newsitem.title: DENMARK: DENMARK'S FLS IN JOINT VENTURE WITH DORBYL.
newsitem.headline: DENMARK'S FLS IN JOINT VENTURE WITH DORBYL.

text.p: Danish engineering group FLS Industries said on Wednesday that its Fuller- F.L.Smidth Minerals unit had set up a new joint venture with South Africa's Dorbyl Ltd .
An FLS statement said that the new company, named Fuller-Vecor, would take over Dorbyl's engineering activities and market its mining machinery throughout sub-Saharan Africa.
Fuller-Vecor, formed on January 1, is 60 owned by Fuller-F.L.Smidth and 40 percent by Dorbyl, itself part-owned by Anglo-American Corporation of South Africa Ltd.
The statement gave no indication of the new company's projected turnover or earnings but said it would have 40 employees.
